name: Countryball Run
description:
An endless runner inspired by the polandball comics.
First time releasing a game, hope it goes well!

Jump with Serbiaball over bombs and mines and remove its enemies Europeanunionball and Kebabball.

Highscoreboard included, and the option to play as other countryballs will be added soon!

Nothing in this game is meant to be offensive, its just the humor of the polandball comics.

Controls:

Space - Jump

Ctrl - Throw knife (only while jumping)

Upcoming Updates

  • The possibility to pause
  • More Power-Ups
  • Other Countryballs
  • Better Explosions
  • Better animations
  • Gamespeed increase depending on score
  • Better Music
  • Personalization of the Countryball with items (example: Hats)
  • Android Version
  • Windows Phone Version

The order in which the listed features will be added depends on the feedback I get.

Feedback is welcome and also suggestions.
Looking forward to it.
